db:info.db:title: Tango Weather Icon Pack by Darkobra

db:article.db:para: 74 brand spankin' new Tango icons for your viewing pleasure.

The sources can be found in qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-fog.png, qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-haze.png, qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-icy.png, qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-sleet.png, qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-sunny.png, qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-sunny-very-few-clouds.png, and qtpositioning/examples/positioning/weatherinfo/icons/weather-thundershower.png.
